ovdesc.p: This application is used to store the research reports related to the World Economy.These reports are available to the Internet banking users to download.

desc.p: It holds the date of the report that was last updated.
This is a free format field used to give a description of the report.
Contains the abstract of the report.As this field provides the description which will appear to the Internet Banking User, it is important that it is as precise as possible.
